Articles.Content: I destroy your bulldozer with fire!. My singed and bulldozered hill.

I come back from the future and seeing that I know the future take and rebuild the hill, and protect it from all future threats....because I know the future ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My hill....and paradox

But you made your prediction about the future up. I cause you to explode (it does not help to be a creeper, does it?)

My hill with a debunked myth of paradox.

"I claim this hill in the name of Mars!"

My hill.
Asteroid impact. My crater.
I ride the IXS class to a hill. my hill and IXS class

I make my great return on the forum games and make my hill.

Defenses : Atlantis shields, 3 ZPM's. (and a hamster in a threadwheel). Drones. 

My hill.

(KOTH is boring now that we can not go crazy with our maneuvers)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-12-10T09:08:16Z" title="12/10/2014 09:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">December 10, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**

the IXS warp drive churns your part of universe into a black hole. my IXS class and a unmoveable black hole that will be forgotten about but I will use eventually.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-12-10T15:55:28Z" title="12/10/2014 03:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">December 10, 2014</time> by megatiger78**

And the world and the time reverts to April 2012.

No one's hill.

I spontaneously appear despite not existing at the time.

My hill.

I kill you and plant my flag.

My hill. That totally definitely is defended.

I use science to make a hill.....

on top of your hill.

My hill with a buried corpse and topsoil inside.

I use science to flush you from your hill and deep into the Mariana Trench.

My island.

I place the island back on land and it is now a hill again. 

Also, several Defiant and NX class ships are guarding the hill.

The Federation's (and my) hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-12-20T00:49:16Z" title="12/20/2014 12:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">December 20, 2014</time> by KerbinW365**

The Federation's spaceships all fall out of the sky and explode horribly, they forgot what orbital mechanics were. I whack you with a stick.

My hill.

Don't you know? Don't you know that things can stay in the air if they are capable of warp?

.... A stick? really? I crack it and half and throw it away.

Seriously dude. Sticks do nothing. 

My hill... Also, If you try to bombard me with spaceships, I have got more federation ships in space.

I activate the yellowstone volcanic chamber.

My volcano.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-12-20T01:24:48Z" title="12/20/2014 01:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">December 20, 2014</time> by Tery215**

federation ships, you say? I AM THE CAPATAIN OF THE KESTREL!

as a result they throw you off the hill. I then replace them with FTL ships and 1 IXS class. my hill. that is surrounded by all ships, and has a ring- shaped floran controlled zone to stop anyone getting in

I am a floran.

Me and Megatiger's hill.

Serenity guns you both down. 

My hill!

I activate a low-orbit ion cannon and blast the hill.

My crater.
all ions do is short the electronics. my floran surrounded hill with broken ships

A toxin missile falls on your hill and detonates. Killing every organic being on the hill.

Now I send several unmanned Sovereign and Intrepid ships to guard the hill, and some Scorpion Tanks for extra measure.

My hill
florans are plants. they survive your ebola bomb. sadly the same cannot be said for you and by everything cancer missile. my hill

FIRE! KILL FLORANS WITH FIRE!

I place manhacks and rollermines everywhere!

My hill!
